price: Kuma suka ce: "Shin, gumãkanmu ne mafĩfĩta kõ shi (¦an Maryama)?" Ba su buga wannan misãli ba a gare ka fãce dõmin yin jidãli.* Ã'a, sũ mutãne nemãsu husũma.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَأَٰلِهَتُنَا خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ هُوَۚ مَا ضَرَبُوهُ لَكَ إِلَّا جَدَلَۢاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٌ خَصِمُونَ
footnotes: * Wãtau da aka ce gumãka damãsu bauta musu duka abincin wutar Jahannama ne kamar yadda yake a cikin sura ta 21 ãyã ta 98 da 99, sai suka ce sun yarda gumakansu su zama tãre da ɗan Maryama.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū aālihatunā khayrun am huwa mā ḍarabūhu laka illā jadalan bal hum qawmun khaṣimūna
